short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI-powered extension providing visually impaired users with audible web page navigation by vocalizing webpages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unglasses.ai is dedicated to making the digital world more accessible for individuals with visual impairments. As a tool of our dedicated search engine, our Chrome extension leverages the latest advancements in artificial intelligence to offer an innovative solution for web navigation. By providing vocal descriptions of websites' text, images, and structure, we aim to empower visually impaired users to explore the internet with greater efficiency and independence.

Features Include:

- AI-Driven Web Page Analysis
Delivers real-time vocal descriptions of websites, covering layout, text, and visual content.

- Voice-Powered Web Navigation
Enables visually impaired users to navigate sites vocally by listing all pages audibly, enhancing efficient and independent web exploration.

- Detailed Image Descriptions
Provides comprehensive verbal descriptions of images, enhancing understanding of visual content.

- Enhanced Accessibility Through Shortcuts
Enables quick and easy web page analysis through user-friendly keyboard shortcuts, making the internet more navigable for visually impaired users.

- Multilingual Support
Recognizes and synthesizes voice in over 23 languages, breaking down language barriers in voice navigation and content interpretation.

- Privacy-First Processing
We ensure utmost privacy by deleting all processed web page data immediately after delivering our vocal analysis. Your content is secure and never stored.

By integrating with our search engine, Unglasses.ai extends the reach of accessible technology, opening up new avenues for information discovery and engagement. We invite you to join us in this endeavor to democratize access to the web, fostering a community where technology bridges gaps rather than creating them.
